title: Rep. Paul Gosar Tweets Animated Video of Him Attacking Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez
sub_head: Republican congressman’s video on Twitter and Instagram sparked backlash on social media and criticism from the White House
body:
Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) shared an anime video on Twitter and Instagram on Monday where he appeared to be shown attacking Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D., N.Y.) with a sword and poised to attack President Biden, prompting backlash on social media.
Ms. Ocasio-Cortez later tweeted that Mr. Gosar was “a creepy member I work with” and said he “shared a fantasy video of him killing me.”
